name: Dr. Sandra Miller
desc: Over the past year we have seen an increase in publicity surrounding mental health and a rise in the number of people campaigning to encourage others to come forward and share their stories. There have been many famous faces behind these campaigns, with lots of male celebrities helping to drive them forward
